cards.flavor_text: [i]Cyrius's magic flowed through the her lover's body, expanding her powers and threatening the entire grove. Cyra knew only one way halt the corruption.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Scry 2, then exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Each rapture took something with it. A memory, a mercy, a name. And though he stood again, nothing in him could say why he still remained.[/i]

cards.rules_text: You or target permanent you control gains hexproof until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Cyrius's touch slid through her soul like smoke, searching for a heart to cage. But Rozen had buried her heart long ago, where no hand could reach. She did not need it to fight.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}: Target nonbasic land you don't control and Crumbling Ruin each lose all abilities and gain “{T}: Add one mana of any color.”

Flying
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each other Warlock you control.
Whenever another Horror you control attacks, you may exile an instant or sorcery card from you graveyard. You may cast a copy of that card. [i](You still pay its costs.)[/i]

If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
At the beginning of your end step, target player exiles a card from their graveyard. If they can't, scry 1.
